Text: Thanks!  Great series.  I've only watched the first two so far, but I'm getting the impression from the official site that this is actually a 3-part series, not 4.  Anyone able to confirm or refute that?

Part 4: Homo Interneticus
Will be released on 2nd March.

Login to forums[dot]mvgroup[dot]org and read The Virtual Revolution thread.

Here's the BBC page for episode 4:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b00r3qhg
All the episodes in both Xvid and 720p are available at MVGroup (forums[dot]mvgroup[dot]org) with subtitles as well.
